channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 缅甸军政府因应对叛军进攻而被指控犯有战争罪
item.description: Myanmar's military has likely perpetrated indiscriminate attacks on civilians and used banned cluster munitions in its fight against ethnic minority insurgents, Amnesty International said on Thursday, calling for an investigation of suspected war crimes.翻译:国际特赦组织周四表示，缅甸军方在打击少数民族叛乱分子的过程中可能对平民进行了不分青红皂白的袭击，并使用了违禁的集束弹药，并呼吁对涉嫌战争罪进行调查。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 惠誉将万达商业评级下调至“限制性违约”，随后升级至“CC”
item.description: Fitch Ratings downgraded Dalian Wanda Commercial Management Group to "restricted default (RD)" from "C" on completion of the distressed debt exchange, and simultaneously upgraded the firm to "CC" from "RD" to reflect its post-restructuring profile.翻译:不良债务置换完成后，惠誉评级将大连万达商业管理集团的评级从“C”下调至“限制性违约(RD)”，同时将该公司从“RD”升级至“CC”，以反映其重组后的状况。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中菲关系：南海争端重大事件
item.description: Relations between Manila and Beijing have soured under Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, with Manila pivoting back towards the United States which supports the Southeast Asian nation in its maritime disputes with China.翻译:在菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯的领导下，马尼拉和北京之间的关系恶化，马尼拉转向支持菲律宾与中国的海上争端的美国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 在具有里程碑意义的安全案件中，香港维权律师被拒绝保释
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Thursday rejected a fresh bail application for pro-democracy activist and lawyer Chow Hang-tung, whose subversion trial under a China-imposed national security law is expected to open in late 2024.翻译:香港一家法院周四驳回了亲民主活动人士兼律师周恒东的新保释申请，根据中国实施的国家安全法，周恒东的颠覆罪审判预计将于 2024 年底开始。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam

item.title: 中国煤矿事故已造成12人死亡
item.description: An accident at a coal mine in China's northeastern province of Heilongjiang has killed 12, state broadcaster CCTV said on Thursday.翻译:据中央电视台周四报道，中国东北省份黑龙江省一处煤矿发生事故，已造成 12 人死亡。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国考虑提高中国电动汽车关税 - 华尔街日报
item.description: The Biden administration in the United States is discussing raising tariffs on some Chinese goods, including electric vehicles (EVs), the Wall Street Journal said on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话称，美国拜登政府正在讨论提高对包括电动汽车在内的部分中国商品的关税。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港法院判处资深劳工活动人士的妹妹监禁六个月
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Thursday sentenced the younger sister of a pro-democracy labour union leader to six months imprisonment for removing evidence from the latter's home amid an ongoing security crackdown in the China-ruled city.翻译:香港一家法院周四判处一名亲民主工会领导人的妹妹六个月监禁，原因是在这座中国统治的城市正在进行的安全镇压期间，她从后者的家中带走了证据。
item.author: Edward Cho, Jessie Pang

item.title: 中国警告菲律宾不要在南海问题上“误算”
item.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi has told the Philippines to address through dialogue serious difficulties in their relations over the South China Sea, warning that any miscalculation would prompt Beijing to defend itself and "respond resolutely".翻译:中国外交部长王毅告诉菲律宾，通过对话解决两国关系在南海问题上的严重困难，并警告说，任何误判都会促使北京为自己辩护并“坚决回应”。
item.author: Liz Lee, Karen Lema

item.title: 台湾指责中国在取消关税后实施经济胁迫
item.description: Taiwan on Thursday accused China of economic coercion and election interference after Beijing announced the end of tariff cuts on some chemical imports from the island, saying Taipei violated a trade agreement, just ahead of Taiwanese elections.翻译:台湾周四指责中国进行经济胁迫和选举干涉，此前北京宣布结束对台湾部分化学品进口的关税削减，并称台北违反了一项贸易协议，就在台湾大选之前。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Liz Lee

item.title: 韩国和日本在关系改善的情况下恢复高层经济会谈
item.description: South Korea and Japan held high-level economic talks on Thursday for the first time in eight years, in a further sign of improving ties as the countries are drawn closer by shared geopolitical concerns.翻译:韩国和日本周四举行了八年来的首次高层经济会谈，这进一步表明随着两国因共同的地缘政治担忧而走得更近，两国关系正在改善。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 上海遭遇40年来最严重寒流
item.description: China's financial hub was set to record its chilliest period in December in four decades, spurring authorities to issue warnings for low temperatures and wind, while northern cities battled icy conditions.翻译:中国的金融中心将在12月创下四十年来最寒冷的时期，促使当局发布低温和大风警告，而北方城市则在与冰冷的环境作斗争。
item.author: Casey Hall, Nicoco Chan, Ryan Woo

item.title: 中国地震后仍有12人失踪，137人死亡
item.description: A dozen people were still missing on Thursday after a 6.2-magnitude earthquake struck northwestern Gansu province late Monday, and netizens questioned the speed at which rescue operations had ended.翻译:周一晚间甘肃省西北部发生6.2级地震，周四仍有十几人失踪，网友质疑救援行动结束的速度。
item.author: Alessandro Diviggiano, Xiaoyu Yin, Liz Lee

item.title: 中国以妈祖“和平女神”宗教作为台湾选举的武器
item.description: The Chinese Communist Party is ramping up exchanges with folk religious groups in rural Taiwan in an attempt to manipulate political opinion in Beijing's favour ahead of elections next month, according to Taiwan government documents.翻译:台湾政府文件显示，中国共产党正在加强与台湾农村民间宗教团体的交流，试图在下个月的选举前操纵政治舆论，使之有利于北京。
item.author: James Pomfret, Yimou Lee

item.title: 随着零售商寻求接触中国消费者的新方式，“代购”走向企业化
item.description: Daigou translates as 'buying on behalf of'. Before the pandemic, millions of Chinese made a living by buying items that were cheaper overseas and then reselling them inside China.翻译:代购翻译为“代表购买”。在大流行之前，数百万中国人通过购买海外更便宜的商品然后在国内转售来谋生。
item.author: Casey Hall, Stella Qiu

item.title: 美国参议员马可·卢比奥呼吁拜登制裁中国芯片公司灿芯半导体
item.description: Republican lawmaker Marco Rubio on Wednesday urged the Biden administration to sanction Chinese chip design firm Brite Semiconductor over its ties to China's top sanctioned chipmaker and its work for Chinese military suppliers.翻译:共和党议员马可·卢比奥周三敦促拜登政府制裁中国芯片设计公司灿芯半导体，因为该公司与中国最受制裁的芯片制造商有联系，并为中国军事供应商提供服务。
item.author: Alexandra Alper

item.title: 波音公司将于 2021 年起向中国交付首架梦想飞机 - 消息人士
item.description: Boeing is set to restart deliveries of its 787 Dreamliner to China within days, a source told Reuters, a step that could pave the way for China to also end a more than four-year freeze on deliveries of Boeing's profit-making 737 MAX.翻译:一位消息人士告诉路透社，波音公司将在几天内重新开始向中国交付 787 梦想客机，此举可能为中国结束长达四年多的波音盈利型 737 MAX 交付冻结铺平道路。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟将对中国生物柴油倾销指控展开调查
item.description: The European Union said on Wednesday it would begin an anti-dumping investigation into biodiesel imports from China, which the bloc's industry says has slashed domestic production.翻译:欧盟周三表示，将对从中国进口的生物柴油展开反倾销调查，欧盟业界称中国生产的生物柴油已大幅削减国内产量。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾总统候选人称，在中国眼中，我们都是分裂分子
item.description: In China's eyes all three Taiwan presidential candidates are separatists, the frontrunner to be the island's next leader said on Wednesday in a fractious joint televised address with the other contenders.翻译:台湾下一任领导人的领跑者周三在与其他竞争者的联合电视讲话中表示，在中国眼中，所有三位台湾总统候选人都是分裂分子。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Angie Teo

item.title: 美中关系：预计2024年将出现更多动荡
item.description: After a year that brought panic over spy balloons, a fight over semiconductors and an intensifying military rivalry, China and the U.S. are ending the year with an uneasy detente.翻译:经过一年的间谍气球恐慌、半导体之争以及日益激烈的军事竞争，中国和美国将以令人不安的缓和局势结束这一年。
item.author: Don Durfee, Antoni Slodkowski

item.title: 中国地震灾民在零下严寒中被安全救出
item.description: Braving sub-zero cold, rescuers on Wednesday pulled to safety victims of an earthquake that rocked a remote area in China's northwestern Gansu province, while survivors faced months of uncertainty ahead without permanent shelter.翻译:周三，救援人员冒着零度以下的寒冷，将中国西北部甘肃省偏远地区地震的受害者救出，而幸存者将面临未来几个月的不确定性，没有永久的住所。
item.author: Alessandro Diviggiano, Xiaoyu Yin, Liz Lee
